title: Slang Shading Language Translator Overview
sub_title: Platform agnostic shader language | Overview | Adoption
description: The Slang Shading Language Translator converts Slang shaders into HLSL, GLSL, or SPIR-V, enabling cross-platform compatibility with DirectX, Vulkan, and OpenGL. It ensures optimized performance and supports advanced features like meta-programming and modular code.
